message.body: Hey, can we talk about Jon Rogone staying in the band? He's been incredibly dedicated and it's important to me and I think the company...
Well, really, we should meet, we have so much to talk about! do you have any weekdays free before the meeting Thursday? Hearts
I can meet tomorrow after 8 or wednesday. Im not opposed to john rogone in the band, i did ask john thompson and i haven't gotten a firm answer. Do we have a sound effects person in the budget?
Yes and John Thompson said yes on the email chain to returning!!! Yay!
Cool, can you meet tomorrow or wednesday?
